item.title: Roughly 60 countries the US sees as the "worst offenders" will face specific "reciprocal" tariffs, which will be taxes charged on imported goods, and the EU was hit with a 20 per cent tariff. #DonaldTrump #Tariffs #GlobalTrade #StockMarket #Economy #USEco
